html:
8.1.18  1:22 pm   why did i waste £23 buying a 'how to play a c major scale' shirt

     why did i waste time making it

8.1.18  11:57 am   What is normal?

     a table

8.1.18  11:51 am   I'm the monopoly man!

     do you ever wish there was a monopoly woman

8.1.18  11:50 am   should i do tumblr?

     might have already been done

8.1.18  11:49 am   Have you been to new canaan, Pennsylvania?

     it doesn't exist

8.1.18  11:44 am   What's it feel like to be outside,

     pretty good

      and is there anything truly noble you can do outside?

     stop global warming?

8.1.18  10:51 am   i'm so tired, how do I wake up

     you must go to sleep before you are allowed to wake up

8.1.18  10:38 am   sometimes I look at words and think about how weird they actually sound and wonder how things got that way. i'd rather just make my own words and call it a day.

     don't stop there, make more the following day

8.1.18  9:20 am   Are you ever going to add more content to the reality section?

     oh hell yeah

8.1.18  8:42 am   can you play thy kazoo?

     yes

8.1.18  8:22 am   what do you think about icosahedron?

     could use more faces

8.1.18  8:17 am   why did all the boys in congress get mad

     due to anger

8.1.18  8:00 am   I'm actually concerned for you, are you alright?

     yes, are you

     Are you having suicidal thoughts?

     no, are you

     I'm not going to play armchair therapist, I'm just concerned.

     why

8.1.18  7:55 am   did you make the "hello sexy pants" video just to show off your new greenscreen?

      the reverse.... i got the green screen to use in my videos

8.1.18  7:45 am   How do you make the music videos? Do you trip on shrooms or LSD and then show what you saw? 

     close, but i don't actually take the shrooms and LSD, i just stare at it on the shelf and imagine what i would see if i took them. at that point the video is almost done and just needs some finishing touches

8.1.18  7:22 am   what's the strategy

     unlock the key to the secrets

8.1.18  4:00 am   Do you eat an egg with a fork or a spoon?

     just eat it off the wall. throw it at the wall first. must throw it hard or it may fall off

8.1.18  3:53 am   what do u want for ur birthday

     another spatula

8.1.18  3:03 am   do you know of any equipment i could use to change a guitar's sound beyond adding effects?

     how about a blow torch

8.1.18  2:48 am   coke or pepsi?

     how about an unlimited supply of fresh drinking water, for planet earth

8.1.18  2:47 am   do you ever have important realizations that you recurrently forget then later remember even harder

     yes

8.1.18  2:40 am   Your music reminds me of the little jingles or theme songs you hear on PBS (Public Broadcasting). Is this on purpose?

     no

8.1.18  1:45 am   if expecting the unexpected makes the unexpected expected, if i dont expect the expected, does that make the expected unexpected? urgent.

     yes

8.1.18  1:30 am   how can i think about nothing

     don't think about anything

8.1.18  1:21 am   why don't you play in a band/as a session musician with other musicians?

     found an even better job

8.1.18  12:32 am   Favorite book/book series?

     the phone book

8.1.18  12:00 am   is water wet

     i don't care

8.1.18  12:00 am   tell me a joke

     jokes tell themselves





PREVIOUS QUESTIONS

7.31.18  11:58 pm   have you ever gone on a date?

     i feel like i've been on a date for my entire life

7.31.18  11:55 pm   how did you get so good at writing/playing music?

     i struck myself by lightning a few times

7.31.18  11:49 pm   favorite dinosaur?

     the screaming ones

7.31.18  11:46 pm   are you secretly a mouse?

     let's think about this. if i was, would i be able to say it here

7.31.18  11:46 pm   would you like an orange?

     oh that would be the perfect addition to my orange collection

7.31.18  11:36 pm   Last question of July??

     we'll see about that

7.31.18  11:18 pm   hey it's me santa what would you like for christmas

     a new year

7.31.18  10:04 pm   do you game

     i am game

7.31.18  9:52 pm   7.18.18  5:23 pm     i think mr lennon was saying "its got a back beat you can't lose it". i am offended and believe this is a personal vendetta.

     i'm not sure what you mean, but that was not written by john lennon, it was actually a chuck berry song

7.31.18  9:45 pm   If you could visit a planet, which would it be?

     i'm looking through the catalog now and most of them seem pretty scary

7.31.18  9:44 pm   does the day actually go on for you?

     it seems like my entire life goes on

7.31.18  9:27 pm   What's the tempo of the song you're doing now?

     86

7.31.18  9:14 pm   have you ever gotten the big sad??....

     occasionally

      if so ...how did you cope with that?

     write stories about it

7.31.18  9:01 pm   do you ever hold your own hand and pretend it's someone else's hand? or is it just me

     it's usually not very convincing

7.31.18  8:38 pm   Bill, do you plank?

     only on the sabbath

7.31.18  7:38 pm   help me i have too many opposable thumbs

     the more opposable thumbs you have, the more powerful you can be

7.31.18  6:00 pm   Describe your ideal apartment if we all lived on Mars.

     that may be thinking a few steps ahead. let's first figure out the ideal atmosphere

7.31.18  5:59 pm   What would you grow in your herb garden if your window sill could handle it?

     how about some cool elixirs

7.31.18  5:57 pm   what is the good note

     you

7.31.18  4:19 pm   do you own a language?

     all languages are shared

7.31.18  4:16 pm   Can you help me understand reharmonization?

     it means changing the chords. but there are other things to change too, such as the lyrics, melody, rhythm, and many many other things you could change, and another thing some people forget which is keeping some things the same. but the advantage of just changing all the chords is that you get to say the word 'reharmonization' and therefore get invited to much cooler parties that way

7.31.18  3:53 pm   a bird is trying to fly into my house. what do i do?

     

7.31.18  3:22 pm   am i the money man? or is someone else the money man?

     there are many money men, and women

7.31.18  3:21 pm   what would you do if you were a grass

     grow, maybe others could watch

7.31.18  2:23 pm   what do you think is the best way to create music to your personality?

     which ever way you enjoy most

7.31.18  1:37 pm   What is your favorite soda?

     minne

7.31.18  1:08 pm   7.30.18 7:01 pm But movie star and stupid song both start with an instrumental part (although the chorus is the first thing sung). Do you have any songs that literally jump straight into the chorus without any intro or lead-in or anything like that?

     the one i am doing now does that

7.31.18  1:03 pm   you eat bugs?

     i drink them

7.31.18  12:44 pm   How do i remeber my name

     write a best selling novel and put your name on the front, bigger than the title

7.31.18  12:41 pm   is there a game that you can play with yourself

     you can play kick the can as long as you are willing to go get the can each time and bring it back so you can kick it again

7.31.18  12:38 pm   why do you claim that you are a duck when you are not a duck

     it's sort of a fun role play

7.31.18  12:35 pm   you could make a q&a livestream every monday when you figure out how you do it. It's actually really simple.

     it's very tempting to do something like that but i think q&a live streams are really awkward. also i have bad zits most of the time

7.31.18  12:15 pm   would you rather have goo or gloop

     goo

7.31.18  11:34 am   I am suspecting art is just a secret scam to get away with being different without dying. If so, I'm sorry for blowing the secret.

     that's ok

7.31.18  11:21 am   whats the first song you remember jammin to?

     the alphabet song (the one with the same melody as twinkle twinkle little star)

7.31.18  10:44 am   i want to purchase a keyboard larger than 25 keys but also i'm a new adult who has only ever moved enough stuff to fit in a few cardboard boxes. if i were to move across states (or even countries) with a multiple foot long keyboard and no driver's license (though i could probably get one if necessary), how the heck would i do that

     some of the 61 key keyboards are extremely light. the one i use is very very very light and that's actually the main reason i got it. i once carried it the entire length of central park, new york (60th ave to 110th) with the keyboard (in a case) on my right shoulder and a bag of cymbals on my left. and still felt light enough to enjoy myself

7.31.18  10:43 am   In the past, you were asked what your favorite type of pants were, and you answered smart. With the release of your new single double platinum hit "hello sexy pants", has your preference of pants change?

     no

7.31.18  10:35 am   What's a thoughtful gift for someone who just got out of hospital?

     a new space ship

7.31.18  10:20 am   here's the! thing....

     oh i can see it there

7.31.18  10:14 am   why dont you try making the video first, and then making music that fits it

     i have done that many times before

7.31.18  10:05 am   i hate my boring job but it requires my full concentration. i have an art i'm working on that is in its early stages and it's like everyday is a rainbow of new ideas and excitement, so much so that i keep thinking about it during work and not getting work done. how do i actually concentrate on work and not get fired.

     i'm not sure

7.31.18  10:00 am   do you prefer coconuts over normal nuts

     one of each would be nice
